senses.sense_definition: A player in sports such as football or hockey who plays in the central part of the field, positioned between the defenders and the attackers.

examples.text: The <w>midfielder</w> passed the ball forward to the striker who scored a goal.
A good <w>midfielder</w> needs to have plenty of energy to run up and down the pitch.
The coach decided to substitute the tired <w>midfielder</w> late in the second half.
